name: Germeez
description:
Interesting, it seems you are a germ under a microscope. Who could possibly be wasting their time examining you? Might as well give them a show. Those other guys look small enough to eat. Why not show the observer just how large you can be!

Avoid the biggies, eat your food, and become the largest germ ever seen!

 *************** Germeez ***************

Game Objective: Become the largest germ under the slide

Controls:  WASD

(Created for a 12-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Sounds :: Adrian Fisher
